verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses on the plains of Moab beside the Jordan River, across from Jericho.

verses.kjv: Command the children of Israel, that they give unto the Levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye shall give also unto the Levites suburbs for the cities round about them.
verses.web: “Command the children of Israel to give to the Levites cities to dwell in out of their inheritance. You shall give pasture lands for the cities around them to the Levites.
verses.ct: "Tell the Israelites to give the Levites some cities to live in from the land they inherit. They must also give the Levites pasturelands surrounding those cities.

verses.kjv: And the cities shall they have to dwell in; and the suburbs of them shall be for their cattle, and for their goods, and for all their beasts.
verses.web: They shall have the cities to dwell in. Their pasture lands shall be for their livestock, and for their possessions, and for all their animals.
verses.ct: The cities will be their homes, and the surrounding pasturelands will be for their cattle, their property, and all their other animals.

verses.kjv: And the suburbs of the cities, which ye shall give unto the Levites, shall reach from the wall of the city and outward a thousand cubits round about.
verses.web: “The pasture lands of the cities, which you shall give to the Levites, shall be from the wall of the city and outward one thousand cubits around it.
verses.ct: The pasturelands you give the Levites must extend 1,000 cubits outward from the city walls in every direction.

verses.kjv: And ye shall measure from without the city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the south side two thousand cubits, and on the west side two thousand cubits, and on the north side two thousand cubits; and the city shall be in the midst: this shall be to them the suburbs of the cities.
verses.web: You shall measure outside of the city for the east side two thousand cubits, and for the south side two thousand cubits, and for the west side two thousand cubits, and for the north side two thousand cubits, the city being in the middle. This shall be the pasture lands of their cities.
verses.ct: Outside the city, measure 2,000 cubits to the east, 2,000 cubits to the south, 2,000 cubits to the west, and 2,000 cubits to the north, with the city at the center. This will be the pasturelands for their cities.

verses.kjv: And among the cities which ye shall give unto the Levites there shall be six cities for refuge, which ye shall appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee thither: and to them ye shall add forty and two cities.
verses.web: “The cities which you shall give to the Levites, they shall be the six cities of refuge, which you shall give for the man slayer to flee to. Besides them you shall give forty-two cities.
verses.ct: Among the cities you give the Levites, 6 must be designated as cities of refuge — places where someone who has killed another person accidentally can flee for safety. In addition to those, give them 42 other cities.

verses.kjv: So all the cities which ye shall give to the Levites shall be forty and eight cities: them shall ye give with their suburbs.
verses.web: All the cities which you shall give to the Levites shall be forty-eight cities together with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: So the total number of cities given to the Levites will be 48, each with its surrounding pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And the cities which ye shall give shall be of the possession of the children of Israel: from them that have many ye shall give many; but from them that have few ye shall give few: every one shall give of his cities unto the Levites according to his inheritance which he inheriteth.
verses.web: Concerning the cities which you shall give of the possession of the children of Israel, from the many you shall take many, and from the few you shall take few. Everyone according to his inheritance which he inherits shall give some of his cities to the Levites.”
verses.ct: These cities will come from the land belonging to the other Israelite tribes. Tribes with more land must give more cities, and tribes with less land must give fewer. Each tribe must contribute cities to the Levites in proportion to the territory it receives."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: Then the LORD said to Moses,

verses.kjv: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye be come over Jordan into the land of Canaan;
verses.web: “Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘When you pass over the Jordan into the land of Canaan,
verses.ct: "Tell the Israelites: When you cross the Jordan River into the land of Canaan,

verses.kjv: Then ye shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares.
verses.web: then you shall appoint for yourselves cities to be cities of refuge for you, that the man slayer who kills any person unwittingly may flee there.
verses.ct: you must designate certain cities as cities of refuge. Anyone who accidentally kills another person can flee to one of these cities for protection.

verses.kjv: And they shall be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before the congregation in judgment.
verses.web: The cities shall be for your refuge from the avenger, that the man slayer not die until he stands before the congregation for judgment.
verses.ct: These cities will be your places of safety from the avenger of blood, so that the person who killed someone doesn't die before standing trial before the community.

verses.kjv: And of these cities which ye shall give six cities shall ye have for refuge.
verses.web: The cities which you shall give shall be for you six cities of refuge.
verses.ct: You must set aside 6 cities of refuge in all.

verses.kjv: Ye shall give three cities on this side Jordan, and three cities shall ye give in the land of Canaan, which shall be cities of refuge.
verses.web: You shall give three cities beyond the Jordan, and you shall give three cities in the land of Canaan. They shall be cities of refuge.
verses.ct: Place 3 of them on the east side of the Jordan and 3 in the land of Canaan. All 6 will serve as cities of refuge.

verses.kjv: These six cities shall be a refuge, both for the children of Israel, and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that killeth any person unawares may flee thither.
verses.web: For the children of Israel, and for the stranger and for the foreigner living among them, shall these six cities be for refuge, that everyone who kills any person unwittingly may flee there.
verses.ct: These 6 cities of refuge will be available not only to Israelites but also to foreigners and immigrants living among you. Anyone who accidentally kills someone may flee to one of them.

verses.kjv: And if he smite him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.web: “ ‘But if he struck him with an instrument of iron, so that he died, he is a murderer. The murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: However, if someone strikes another person with an iron weapon and kills them, that person is a murderer. The murderer must be put to death.

verses.kjv: And if he smite him with throwing a stone, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.web: If he struck him with a stone in the hand, by which a man may die, and he died, he is a murderer. The murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: If someone picks up a stone large enough to kill and strikes another person to death with it, that person is a murderer. The murderer must be put to death.

verses.kjv: Or if he smite him with an hand weapon of wood, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.web: Or if he struck him with a weapon of wood in the hand, by which a man may die, and he died, he is a murderer. The murderer shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: If someone strikes another person with a wooden weapon capable of causing death, and the person dies, the attacker is a murderer. The murderer must be put to death.

verses.kjv: The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meeteth him, he shall slay him.
verses.web: The avenger of blood shall himself put the murderer to death. When he meets him, he shall put him to death.
verses.ct: The avenger of blood is the one who must execute the murderer. When the avenger finds the murderer, the avenger must kill him.

verses.kjv: But if he thrust him of hatred, or hurl at him by laying of wait, that he die;
verses.web: If he shoved him out of hatred, or hurled something at him while lying in wait, so that he died,
verses.ct: If someone shoves another person out of hatred, or throws something at them from ambush, and the person dies,

verses.kjv: Or in enmity smite him with his hand, that he die: he that smote him shall surely be put to death; for he is a murderer: the revenger of blood shall slay the murderer, when he meeteth him.
verses.web: or in hostility struck him with his hand, so that he died, he who struck him shall surely be put to death. He is a murderer. The avenger of blood shall put the murderer to death when he meets him.
verses.ct: or if someone strikes another person with their fist out of hostility and the person dies — the attacker must be put to death, because he is a murderer. The avenger of blood must kill the murderer when he finds him.

verses.kjv: But if he thrust him suddenly without enmity, or have cast upon him any thing without laying of wait,
verses.web: “ ‘But if he shoved him suddenly without hostility, or hurled on him anything without lying in wait,
verses.ct: But suppose someone shoves another person suddenly, without any hostility, or throws something at them without lying in wait,

verses.kjv: Or with any stone, wherewith a man may die, seeing him not, and cast it upon him, that he die, and was not his enemy, neither sought his harm:
verses.web: or with any stone, by which a man may die, not seeing him, and cast it on him so that he died, and he was not his enemy and not seeking his harm,
verses.ct: or drops a stone large enough to kill on someone without seeing them — and the person dies — but the one who did it wasn't an enemy and didn't intend any harm.

verses.kjv: Then the congregation shall judge between the slayer and the revenger of blood according to these judgments:
verses.web: then the congregation shall judge between the striker and the avenger of blood according to these ordinances.
verses.ct: In that case, the community must judge between the one who caused the death and the avenger of blood, following these rules.

verses.kjv: And the congregation shall deliver the slayer out of the hand of the revenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to the city of his refuge, whither he was fled: and he shall abide in it unto the death of the high priest, which was anointed with the holy oil.
verses.web: The congregation shall deliver the man slayer out of the hand of the avenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to his city of refuge, where he had fled. He shall dwell therein until the death of the high priest, who was anointed with the holy oil.
verses.ct: The community must protect the person who caused the death from the avenger of blood and send them back to the city of refuge where they originally fled. That person must stay there until the high priest — the one anointed with holy oil — dies.

verses.kjv: But if the slayer shall at any time come without the border of the city of his refuge, whither he was fled;
verses.web: “ ‘But if the man slayer shall at any time go beyond the border of his city of refuge where he flees,
verses.ct: But if the person who caused the death ever leaves the boundaries of the city of refuge where they fled,

verses.kjv: And the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he shall not be guilty of blood:
verses.web: and the avenger of blood finds him outside of the border of his city of refuge, and the avenger of blood kills the man slayer, he shall not be guilty of blood,
verses.ct: and the avenger of blood finds them outside those boundaries and kills them, the avenger will not be guilty of bloodshed.

verses.kjv: Because he should have remained in the city of his refuge until the death of the high priest: but after the death of the high priest the slayer shall return into the land of his possession.
verses.web: because he should have remained in his city of refuge until the death of the high priest. But after the death of the high priest, the man slayer shall return into the land of his possession.
verses.ct: The person should have stayed inside the city of refuge until the high priest died. Only after the high priest's death may they return to the land they own.

verses.kjv: So these things shall be for a statute of judgment unto you throughout your generations in all your dwellings.
verses.web: “ ‘These things shall be for a statute and ordinance to you throughout your generations in all your dwellings.
verses.ct: These rules must be followed as a permanent law throughout all your generations, wherever you live.

verses.kjv: Whoso killeth any person, the murderer shall be put to death by the mouth of witnesses: but one witness shall not testify against any person to cause him to die.
verses.web: “ ‘Whoever kills any person, the murderer shall be slain based on the testimony of witnesses; but one witness shall not testify alone against any person so that he dies.
verses.ct: Anyone who kills a person may be put to death only on the testimony of multiple witnesses. No one may be executed based on the testimony of just 1 witness.

verses.kjv: Moreover ye shall take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which is guilty of death: but he shall be surely put to death.
verses.web: “ ‘Moreover you shall take no ransom for the life of a murderer who is guilty of death. He shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: Never accept a ransom payment for the life of a murderer who deserves to die. That person must be put to death.

verses.kjv: And ye shall take no satisfaction for him that is fled to the city of his refuge, that he should come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the priest.
verses.web: “ ‘You shall take no ransom for him who has fled to his city of refuge, that he may come again to dwell in the land before the death of the priest.
verses.ct: Never accept a ransom payment to let someone leave a city of refuge and return home before the high priest has died.

verses.kjv: So ye shall not pollute the land wherein ye are: for blood it defileth the land: and the land cannot be cleansed of the blood that is shed therein, but by the blood of him that shed it.
verses.web: “ ‘So you shall not pollute the land where you live; for blood pollutes the land. No atonement can be made for the land, for the blood that is shed in it, but by the blood of him who shed it.
verses.ct: Do not pollute the land where you live, because bloodshed defiles the land. The only way atonement can be made for the land when blood has been shed on it is through the blood of the one who shed it.

verses.kjv: Defile not therefore the land which ye shall inhabit, wherein I dwell: for I the LORD dwell among the children of Israel.
verses.web: You shall not defile the land which you inhabit, where I dwell; for I, LORD, dwell among the children of Israel.’ ”
verses.ct: Do not defile the land where you will live, because I live there too. I am the LORD, and I dwell among the people of Israel."
